properties.name: Paul's Coffee Roasters
properties.description: Cosy coffee shop in Larnaca downtown. There are 5-7 well-known coffee origins, V60, Cold Brew and classic drinks. A small main hall and a large garden in the backyard. Few power outlets for digital nomads

properties.name: Uluwatu Specialty Coffee
properties.description: Large selection of coffee origins and comfortable sofas in the old town of Limassol. Few outlets only
